medical_history.chief_complaint: Dull, diffuse, crampy abdominal pain and non-bloody diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 4 days ago in the right lower quadrant (RLQ). Over the past 2 days, the pain has become sharper and worse in quality with radiation to the RLQ. The patient denies nausea but has experienced anorexia since the onset and has also complained of aches in his buttocks and thigh. No emesis, dysuria, or urinary frequency noted.
